title: The cruell brother A tragedy. As it was presented, at the priuate house, in the Blacke-Fryers: by His Maiesties Seruants.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publisher: Imprinted by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Iohn Waterson, and are to bee solde at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,
